input.sentences: she was happy to open her presents .
she received just what she wanted for her birthday .
the kids all sat at the table to have a slice .
even the baby enjoyed the cake .
output.sentences: The kids were very excited that Christmas Day had finally arrived.
Susie's sixth birthday also happened to fall on Christmas Day.
Her family were glad to wish her a happy birthday.
Little sister Wendy had lots of fun, too.
